item.title: The Lores of Manipur
item.author: gupta.karan.11@gmail.com (Karan Gupta)
item.description: The road off Kohima was suddenly so good. If you have been reading through the blogs you know by now that I had been asking everyone about the state of the roads ðŸ˜›. We had not really gotten promising reviews of the road to Imphal and people had said that the road was mildly better so we were kinds prepared for the worst. I was dreading what the rains could have done to the broken roads.
